inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 36, "index": 16}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 54, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 62, "index": 27}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 58, "index": 30}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 33}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 29, "index": 38}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 20, "index": 40}, {"type": "brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a crimson_door, I need to place 6 crimson_planks in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
